titleStmt.title: The Last and best edition of new songs such as are of the most general esteem either in town or court / collected with the greatest care, and printed after the most correct copies.
The Last and best edition of new songs such as are of the most general esteem either in town or court / collected with the greatest care, and printed after the most correct copies.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages torn with print show-through. Signatures D1-D8 from the Huntington Library copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
